name: HKClinicalRecord
desc: A sample that stores a clinical record.

items.name: var clinicalType: HKClinicalType
items.desc: An identifier that indicates the type of record, such as an allergic reaction, a lab result, or a medical procedure.

items.name: var displayName: String
items.desc: The primary display name as shown in the Health app.

items.name: var fhirResource: HKFHIRResource?
items.desc: The Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources (FHIR) data for this record.
